Description: Integral green glazed composition finger-ring: with part of the hoop is missing. The oval bezel is inscribed in sunk relief with a cartouche containing the prenomen of Akhenaten.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: T. Eric Peet & C. Leonard Woolley ‘et al.’, ‘The City of Akhenaten. Excavations of 1921 and 1922 at el-‘Amarneh’, Pt. I, (London 1923), describes the excavations, but not this particular object.
